DOC.brief_summary: Following cryptogenic stroke , many patient nowadays treat percutaneous closure patent foramen ovale ( PFO ) , assume aetiology stroke secondary paradoxical embolism . After PFO closure procedure dual antiplatelet regimen often prescribe 3-6 month several cardiologic neurologic follow-up exam schedule first 12 month follow-up . Usually transthoracic +/- transoesophageal echocardiography ( TTE +/- TEE ) perform 6 month , however kind control systematically perform . In order improve clinical outcome young patient ' population , investigator prospectively perform complete cardiologic neurologic follow-up program patient undergo successful percutaneous closure PFO . The aim control confirm good position PFO-device , confirm absence residual right leave shunt significant atrial arrhythmia Furthermore prospective follow-up analyze possible mechanism lead cerebral stroke recurrence ( e.g . size PFO , presence atrial septal aneurysm , presence residual shunt , size utilized closure device , ... . ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Clinical Follow-up After Percutaneous Closure Patent Foramen Ovale
DOC.detailed_description: At follow-up follow exam perform : - hospital discharge : chest X-ray +/- TTE + 7-days event loop record ( ELR ) - 6 month : clinical cardiologic neurologic examination + TTE + TEE + 7-days ELR + trans-cranial doppler ( TCD ) micro bubble detection . - 1 year : clinical cardiologic neurologic examination + TTE +/- TEE + 7-days ELR + trans-cranial doppler ( TCD ) micro bubble detection +/- cerebral MRI
